thread.title: BRIEF-Royal Sapphire Corp. Announces Letter Of Intent With Puresinse Inc.

title: BRIEF-Royal Sapphire Corp. Announces Letter Of Intent With Puresinse Inc.

organizations.name: announces letter of intent with puresinse inc

text: March 16, 2018 / 9:45 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Royal Sapphire Corp. Announces Letter Of Intent With Puresinse Inc. Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - Royal Sapphire Corp: * ROYAL SAPPHIRE CORP. ANNOUNCES LETTER OF INTENT WITH PURESINSE INC. * ROYAL SAPPHIRE CORP - ‍PURSUANT TO LOI COMPANY AND PURESINSE WILL MOVE FORWARD WITH A BUSINESS COMBINATION ​ * ROYAL SAPPHIRE CORP - ‍ON OR IMMEDIATELY PRIOR TO COMPLETION OF TRANSACTION, IT IS ANTICIPATED THAT CO WILL CHANGE ITS NAME TO PURE GLOBAL CANNABIS INC * ROYAL SAPPHIRE CORP- ON OR IMMEDIATELY PRIOR TO COMPLETION OF TRANSACTION, IT IS ANTICIPATED THAT CO WILL COMPLETE 2:1 CONSOLIDATION OF CO SHARES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
